sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnbndtmanage ( BNDT_ID /* */ , BNDT_DE /* */ , RM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #bndtId# /* */ , #bndtDe# /* */ , #rm# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnbndtmanage SET BNDT_ID=#bndtId# /* */ , BNDT_DE=#bndtDe# /* */ , RM=#rm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE BNDT_ID=#bndtId# /* */ AND BNDT_DE=#bndtDe# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnbndtmanage WHERE BNDT_ID=#bndtId# /* */ AND BNDT_DE=#bndtDe# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT BNDT_ID /* */ , BNDT_DE /* */ , RM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbndtmanage WHERE BNDT_ID=#bndtId# /* */ AND BNDT_DE=#bndtDe# /* */

SELECT BNDT_ID /* */ , BNDT_DE /* */ , RM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnbndtmanage WHERE 1=1
BNDT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BNDT_DE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY BNDT_ID DESC /* */ , BNDT_DE DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnbndtmanage WHERE 1=1
BNDT_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
BNDT_DE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
